context: The Finnish word 'voima' is a noun that can mean strength, power, force, or energy depending on the context. It refers to physical capability, influence, or vitality. When used in different contexts, it might refer to muscular strength (fyysinen voima), political power (poliittinen voima), or energetic force (energian voima). The word can appear in various cases and forms such as voimani (my strength) or voimaa (strength in partitive case).
